item.title: Git Based Negotiations - A Concept Piece
item.description: One of the impetuses for developing legal_markdown was that text based documents, backed by git or another version control system could be a powerful tool for legal practice. But how that would work, in actuality, is still theoretical. This is a concept piece about how git backed negotiation could potentially work.
